description.value:
Replaces the Lower face and Neck, purifies air supply. +20 to Resist toxic gases. Also has a Vox-Synthesiser that transmits voice.

Requirements

Gained only through "Mechanicus Implants" Trait, cannot be removed.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
